definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: (si vera l.) support (of tree), i.e. root, stock (fem. of III. [[כֵּן]]; cf. Syr. kano0 m. id., Che:Ps 397, so Ges); al. take as vb., but LXX kata/rtisai is ag. gramm. (should be [[כּׂנְנׇה]]), and √ [[כנן]] = kan=a protect (Hu Ri De; rd. then [[כּׂ֫נׇּה]]) is improb. Txt. dubious.
